titles.title: American Meat Industry Protection Act of 2023
American Meat Industry Protection Act of 2023
To prohibit the use of Federal funds to support lab-grown meat, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Livestock, Dairy, and Poultry.

bill.summary:
American Meat Industry Protection Act of 2023
This bill prohibits federal funds from being used to support, directly or indirectly, the production, advancement, or enhancement of lab-grown meat (i.e., meat sourced from the cells of animals and artificially produced in a laboratory).
